project_p5.meta.title: Relatorium — Quick Activity Button — Victor de Alcântara Bueno
project_p5.meta.description: Cross-platform Flutter app for rural management with a dashboard and quick shortcuts (QuickActionButton + Semantics + Tooltip + named routes).
project_p5.hero.title: Relatorium — UI Quick Activity Button
project_p5.hero.subtitle: Flutter app for rural management with a dashboard and quick shortcuts to start flows (activities, soil, budgeting, and more).
project_p5.hero.kpi: Dashboard shortcuts: 6 critical actions available in one click, with accessibility and feedback.
project_p5.hero.image_alt: UI and engineering — quick shortcuts on the dashboard
project_p5.tldr.problem: starting frequent flows (activity, soil, budgeting, etc.) required navigation before reaching the action.
project_p5.tldr.solution: standardized shortcuts with QuickActionButton + Semantics + Tooltip and named-route navigation (go_router).
project_p5.tldr.result: a dashboard with consistent, accessible quick entry points to create records and reach key screens.
project_p5.tldr.note: Flutter prototype in this repository, with a Soil & Fertility module and shortcuts integrated into the Dashboard.
project_p5.snapshot.col1: Cross-platform Flutter. Scope: a UI component + dashboard integration.
project_p5.snapshot.col2: Dashboard shortcuts across multiple modules (Activities, Soil, Finance, Pests & Diseases).
project_p5.snapshot.col3: Accessibility (Semantics), feedback (Tooltip), and consistent navigation via named routes.
project_p5.problem_impact.symptoms: quick create/access actions were scattered across screens and menus, delaying the start of the flow.
project_p5.problem_impact.cause: no reusable shortcuts pattern with consistent dashboard navigation.
project_p5.problem_impact.impact: more steps to start frequent entries and a higher chance of navigation drift.
project_p5.approach.step1: actions that start frequent flows in the dashboard (e.g., create activity, soil analysis, budgeting).
project_p5.approach.step2: into a QuickActionButton with Semantics and Tooltip (a single UI + accessibility standard).
project_p5.approach.step3: via named routes (go_router) to keep things predictable and reduce ambiguity.
project_p5.reliability.risks: shortcuts being “invisible” to accessibility, inconsistent navigation, and flow regressions.
project_p5.reliability.guarantees: Semantics defines role and label; Tooltip provides context; named routes reduce drift.
project_p5.reliability.evidence: component implementation and usage in DashboardPage with pushNamed for named routes.
project_p5.stack.title: Stack
project_p5.next.item1: Allow dashboard shortcuts configuration (which actions show up and in what order).
project_p5.next.item2: Add keyboard/focus shortcuts for desktop without losing mobile consistency.
project_p5.next.item3: Expand widget tests covering Semantics, Tooltip, and named-route navigation.
project_p5.conversion.p: If you need to reduce daily in-app steps without breaking accessibility, I redesign flows and implement reusable shortcuts with consistent navigation.
